text: Clement Pryke is an English-American physicist, focusing in astrophysics and cosmology, particularly on the cosmic microwave background. He has been on the faculty of the University of Minnesota and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. He was involved with the Degree Angular Scale Interferometer (DASI), and QUaD microwave background polarization experiments, and is currently co-PI of the BICEP and Keck Array collaboration. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:University of Minnesota faculty Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society
title: Clement Pryke
